title: Associative Property of Multiplication
text: The associative property of multiplication states that if a, $$b$$, c are real numbers, then $$a b c=a b c$$.
speech: The associative property of multiplication states that if a,  b , c are real numbers, then  a b c is equal to, a b c .

, c are real numbers, then   a b c is equal to, a b c

title: Regroup
text: Using the associative property, we can regroup the terms in the expression into $$17((0.25)(4))$$.
speech: Using the associative property, we can regroup the terms in the expression into  17 times, parentheses 0.25 times 4,  .

title: Multiplication
text: The expression now becomes 17(1). What is this value?
